Module TowerDefense
Package models

Class Enemy

  • java.lang.Object
    • models.GameRectangle
      • models.Mobile
        • models.Enemy
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AirEnemy, GroundEnemy

    public abstract class Enemy
extends Mobile
    Holds all data for the enemy. Handles the death and escape effects of the enemy.
    Author:
    Ethan Parks
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        public Enemy​(java.util.List<GameRectangle> path,
             java.awt.geom.Point2D.Double location,
             float health,
             double speed,
             java.awt.Dimension dimension)
        Create new entity.
        Parameters:
        path - The path for the enemy to follow.
        location - Current location of the enemy.
        health - Current health of the enemy.
        speed - Distance traveled per frame.
        dimension - Size of the enemy.

      • onDeath

        public void onDeath​(Model model)
